definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: If cabling is correct, power off the device and reseat the interface card.
sentences.chinese: 假如纜線連接是正確的，關掉設備且重新插入介面卡。

sentences.english: Cable structure can prevent the water into the motor when the cable skin damaged.
sentences.chinese: 電纜線結構可以防止電纜表皮破損時水進入電機中。

sentences.english: Engineers have now connected a power cable to the outside of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 工程師們已經將一根電纜線連到核電站外圍。

sentences.english: Habit is a cable, everyday we wear thread, and soon are can't break it.
sentences.chinese: 習慣是纜線，每天我們都編上一條線，不久將扯不斷。

sentences.english: A straight-through cable is used to make this connection.
sentences.chinese: 直通纜線被用來完成此連接。

sentences.english: Coaxial cable is widely used in urban areas to distribute television signals.
sentences.chinese: 同軸纜線廣泛的用於都會地區以分配電視的訊號。

sentences.english: Cable modems provide an always-on connection and a simple installation.
sentences.chinese: 纜線數據機提供常開型的連線及簡單的安裝。

sentences.english: The two basic types of copper cable are shielded and unshielded .
sentences.chinese: 二種基本的銅質纜線類型是遮蔽和無遮蔽。

sentences.english: Cable testing instruments measure crosstalk by applying a test signal to one wire pair.
sentences.chinese: 纜線測試儀器以加上測試訊號到一對線來測量串音。

sentences.english: These strands of molecules twine around each other to form cable -like structures.
sentences.chinese: 這些分子鏈彼此纏繞，形成纜線狀的結構。

sentences.english: DSL and cable modem connections have become more popular.
sentences.chinese: DSL和纜線數據機連接已更受歡迎。

sentences.english: The detachment of cables from the computer will take an hour.
sentences.chinese: 將電纜線從計算機上拆下來需要一小時。

sentences.english: However, to conserve bandwidth, the actual data is not sent over the wire.
sentences.chinese: 但是，爲了節省帶寬，並不通過纜線發送實際數據。

sentences.english: All the devices are connected to and share a single cable.
sentences.chinese: 所有的設備都由一根電纜線連接。

sentences.english: Is a male or female connector required on the cable?
sentences.chinese: 纜線需要的是公的還是母的連接頭？

sentences.english: Sailors have been tied up, beaten with rifle butts, and whipped with electrical cables.
sentences.chinese: 海員們被捆綁起來，用步槍座毒打，用通電纜線抽打。

definition: environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1

definition: out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
